Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.allowNewInternalUsers
Parameter.description: If set to true, RRS will allow users to register without login in first. Setting it to false only makes sense in a federated Shibboleth context.

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.archiveUsersIdpName
Parameter.description: Name of IdP to be shown to users that have registered unauthenticated. Leave empty to have none shown (e.g. if there is only one).

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.dobesCocLink
Parameter.description: Link to location of file with DoBES Code of Conduct. /ds/RRS_V1/dobes_coc_v2.html

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.dobesCocLicenseName
Parameter.description: Name of the Dobes code of conduct license as stored in the AMS database

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.emailAddressCorpman
Parameter.description: email address of user corpman corpman@mpi.nl

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.corpusServerDb.jndiName
Parameter.description: Corpus DB name e.g. java:comp/env/jdbc/CSDB. If provided, JDBC url, username, password will be ignored!

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.amsInterfaceLink
Parameter.description: URL AMS lat access management system, will be the destination of the link in the 'Thank you' page at the end of the registration process

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.openPathPrefix
Parameter.description: Prefix for http link to nodeId e.g.: /corpus1.mpi.nl/ds/imdi_browser?openpath=MPI177915%23
